Modifications.Value: Akama strikes from the shadows, entering a shadow state and gaining 100% increased attack speed for 5 seconds. He charges toward a target unit, phasing through other units and dealing 200 damage upon impact. If the target’s HP is below 25% and it is not a hero, Akama executes it, instantly refreshing Shadow Ambush.

Akama strikes from the shadows, entering a shadow state and gaining 150% increased attack speed for 6 seconds. He charges toward a target unit, phasing through other units and dealing 250 damage upon impact. If the target’s HP is below 25% and it is not a hero, Akama executes it, instantly refreshing Shadow Ambush.

If the target’s HP is below 25% and it is not a hero, Akama executes it, instantly refreshing Shadow Ambush.

If the target’s HP is below 25% and it is not a hero, Akama executes it, instantly refreshing Shadow Ambush.
